subject: Update Fireblocks config to US Production with JWKS webhook verification
body:
- Switch API URL from sandbox to US Production (api.fireblocks.io)
- Migrate webhook signature verification from static key to JWKS
- Document correct environment: US Production console with Testnet workspace
- Add Fireblocks Configuration section to CLAUDE.md with environment reference

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Update Fireblocks config to US Production with JWKS webhook verification
